fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Shoot a player each even night. If they were visiting you that night, you will land a headshot on them and next night you can use this ability twice (even if it's an odd night.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Headshots are Powerful attacks instead.
- You will be roleblock and redirect immune for one night if you're going to headshot someone.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you.
